name: GreetingsTime
0:
”Alexa, open Greetings Time”
”Play my Birthday greetings”
”Alexa, open Greetings Time and play my Anniversary greetings”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: greetings time
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Receive greetings from your friends and family once you add them as an approved contact, this skill integrates with the Greetings time Android and IOS app to support sending greetings, receiving greetings, changing the output voice, scheduling greetings so that they are delivered to your recipients Alexa device on a specific date and time.

Steps to get started:
1). Visit our website at https://www.greetings-time.com or install the Greetings Time Android or IOS app
2). Create an account using the mobile app
3). Open the Alexa app and enable the Greetings Time skill and if you want to receive notifications accept the necessary permissions
4). Link the account you previously created on the mobile app to the Greetings Time skill by logging in
5). Now you can begin using the skill to play the greetings you received

For questions or feedback please email us at support@greetings-time.com
